.. _`kallisto quant`:

KALLISTO QUANT
==============

Pseudoalign reads and quantify transcripts using kallisto.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule kallisto_quant:
        input:
            fastq = ["reads/{exp}_R1.fastq", "reads/{exp}_R2.fastq"],
            index = "index/transcriptome.idx"
        output:
            directory('quant_results_{exp}')
        params:
            extra = ""
        log:
            "logs/kallisto_quant_{exp}.log"
        threads: 1
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/kallisto/quant"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
